name: Accurate (One Sense)
parameter_prompt: Specify one sense to make Accurate (e.g., Hearing, Smell)
description: An accurate sense can pinpoint exact location. Visual & Tactile are normally accurate. Cost 2 PP for one specific non-standard sense.

name: Accurate (Sense Type)
parameter_prompt: Specify sense type to make Accurate (e.g., Olfactory, Auditory)
description: Makes an entire sense type Accurate. Cost 4 PP for the sense type.

name: Acute (One Sense)
parameter_prompt: Specify one sense to make Acute (e.g., Olfactory, Taste)
description: Sense fine details, distinguish & identify subjects. Visual & Auditory are normally acute. Cost 1 PP for one specific non-standard sense.

name: Acute (Sense Type)
parameter_prompt: Specify sense type to make Acute (e.g., Olfactory)
description: Makes an entire sense type Acute. Cost 2 PP for the sense type.

name: Analytical (One Sense)
parameter_prompt: Specify one Acute sense to make Analytical
description: Perceive specific details like chemical composition, exact dimensions. Applied to an Acute sense. Cost 1 PP for one sense.

name: Analytical (Sense Type)
parameter_prompt: Specify an Acute sense type to make Analytical
description: Makes an entire Acute sense type Analytical. Cost 2 PP for the sense type.

name: Awareness (Descriptor)
parameter_prompt: Specify descriptor for Awareness (e.g., Magic, Psionics, Cosmic)
description: Sense use of effects with a particular descriptor (Perception DC 10). Choose sense type (often mental).

name: Communication Link
parameter_prompt: Individual linked with & sense medium (e.g., 'Telepathic with Professor X')
description: Mental or other link with a specific individual (who must also have this).

name: Counters Concealment (Descriptor)
parameter_prompt: Specify sense type and descriptor it counters (e.g., Vision counters Invisibility)
description: A sense type ignores a specific Concealment effect descriptor.

name: Counters All Concealment
parameter_prompt: Specify sense type that counters all concealment
description: A sense type ignores all Concealment effects.

name: Counters Illusion
parameter_prompt: Specify sense type that counters illusions
description: A sense type ignores Illusion effects, automatically succeeding on resistance.

name: Danger Sense
parameter_prompt: Specify sense type for Danger Sense (e.g., Mental, Auditory, general)
description: Perception check (DC 10) to avoid surprise. Choose sense type.

name: Darkvision
description: See in complete darkness as if it were daylight.

name: Direction Sense
description: Always know direction (e.g., North).

name: Distance Sense
description: Accurately judge distances.

name: Extended Sense
parameter_prompt: Specify sense to extend (e.g., Hearing, Vision)
description: Increases range of a sense. Each rank extends range by a factor of 10 (reduces distance penalty by 1).

name: Infravision
description: See in darkness by detecting heat patterns.

name: Low-Light Vision
description: Ignore circumstance penalties for dim light.

name: Microscopic Vision
description: See tiny objects. Each rank reduces size penalty by 1 (x10 magnification). Rank 1: dust specks, Rank 4: cellular level.

name: Penetrates Concealment
ranked: 1 PP per rank of material Toughness
parameter_prompt: Type of concealment penetrated (e.g., 'Cloth/Wood (2PP)', 'Stone/Metal (4PP)', or 'Material Toughness Ranks')
description: See through solid objects. Cost varies: 2 PP (cloth/wood), 4 PP (stone/metal), or 1 PP per rank of material Toughness vision penetrates.

name: Postcognition
parameter_prompt: Type (Standard 2PP, or Uncontrolled Flaw -4PP on Remote Sensing like effect for 4PP total)
description: Perceive past events related to an area or object. Standard (2PP) or as Flawed Remote Sensing (4PP).

name: Precognition
parameter_prompt: Type (Standard 4PP, or Uncontrolled Flaw -4PP on Remote Sensing like effect for 8PP total)
description: Perceive future events. Standard (4PP) or as Flawed Remote Sensing (8PP). Highly GM dependent.

name: Radio
description: Hear radio frequencies as if they were normal sound.

name: Radius (Sense)
parameter_prompt: Specify sense to make Radius (e.g., Vision, Hearing)
description: Perceive with a sense in all directions around you (360 degrees). Cost 1 PP for each sense it applies to.

name: Ranged (Touch)
description: Extend tactile sense to perception range (usually sight).

name: Rapid Sense
parameter_prompt: Specify sense for Rapid processing & #ranks (e.g., Vision Rank 2 for x100 speed)
description: Process sensory information faster. Each rank reduces time penalty by 1 (x10 speed). Cost 1 PP per rank of Rapid, per sense type.

name: Detect (Descriptor)
parameter_prompt: What is detected and its commonality? (e.g., 'Minds (Common, 2PP)', 'Undead (Uncommon, 1PP)')
description: Sense specific things as a distinct sense. 2 PP for common, 1 PP for uncommon/rare. Can be Acute, Ranged, etc. with other Senses effects.

name: Time Sense
description: Always know the exact time.

name: Tracking
parameter_prompt: Sense used for Tracking (e.g., Olfactory, Visual)
description: Follow trails. Each rank provides +1 circumstance bonus to Perception for tracking, or negates -1 speed penalty. Cost 1 PP per rank.

name: Ultra-Hearing
description: Hear very high and low frequency sounds.

name: Ultravision
description: See into ultraviolet spectrum.
